The '''Birthday Cape''' is a personal [[cape]] that was given to a [[Mojang Studios]] employee.

== Distribution ==
This cape was given to the account Gr8Bizzo, which is the account of Todd Baldwin.<ref>{{tweet|Mojang_Ined|1389251478355841025|I've been getting questions about Gr8_Escape and his cape. The account is owned by a Mojang employee leading the work on http://minecraft.net/. Maybe he is really into birthday parties, I can't blame him :)}}</ref><ref>https://www.twitch.tv/Gr8Bizzo</ref>
